-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.invoicelines
(
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    value numeric(12, 2),
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    fundcode character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    mainaccount character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    schemecode character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    marketingyear character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    deliverybodycode character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    invoicerequestid character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT invoicelines_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.invoicerequests
(
    frn character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    sbi character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    vendor character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    agreementnumber character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    currency character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    description character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    value numeric,
    invoicerequestid character varying(500) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    marketingyear character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    duedate character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    claimreferencenumber character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    claimreference character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    invoiceid uuid NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT paymentrequests_pkey PRIMARY KEY (invoicerequestid)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.invoices
(
    schemetype character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    data character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    reference character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    value numeric(13, 2),
    status character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    approverid character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    approveremail character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    approvedby character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    approved timestamp without time zone,
    createdby character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    updatedby character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    created timestamp without time zone,
    updated timestamp without time zone,
    paymenttype character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    accounttype character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    deliverybody character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    secondaryquestion character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    approvalgroup character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT invoices_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_accountcodes
(
    code_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    recovery_type text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    description text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT pk_account_codes PRIMARY KEY (code_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_accounts_ap
(
    description character varying(123) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    code character varying(123) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    org character varying(123) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT lookup_accounts_ap_pkey PRIMARY KEY (description, code, org)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_ap_chartofaccounts
(
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default"
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_deliverybodycodes
(
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default"
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_deliverybodyinitialselections
(
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    accountcode character varying(2) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    deliverybodydescription character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT delivery_body_initial_selections_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_fundcodes
(
    code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    description text COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT lookup_fundcodes_pkey PRIMARY KEY (code)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_marketingyearcodes
(
    code_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    description text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT pk_marketing_year_codes PRIMARY KEY (code_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_paymenttypes
(
    component_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    description text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT pk_payment_types PRIMARY KEY (component_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_schemecodes
(
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default"
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_schemeinvoicetemplates
(
    id uuid NOT NULL,
    name character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    deliverybodycode character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT schemeinvoicetemplates_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id, code)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_schemeinvoicetemplatessecondaryrpaquestions
(
    name character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    id integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT schemeinvoicetemplatessecondaryrpaquestions_pkey PRIMARY KEY (name)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_schemes
(
    description character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    code character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    org character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default"
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.lookup_schemetypes
(
    component_id integer NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY ( INCREMENT 1 START 1 MINVALUE 1 MAXVALUE 2147483647 CACHE 1 ),
    code text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    description text COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT pk_scheme_types PRIMARY KEY (component_id)
);
END;
